[es-MX]Your account has been locked for security reasons.
Please contact customer service to inquire about
the status of your account.
[es-MX]Invalid user name or password. Please try again.
[es-MX]Your account is not allowed to login. Please contact customer service to inquire about the status of your account.
[es-MX]User name or password may not be blank. Please try again.
[es-MX]Your password is expiring in {0} day(s). If you have time, why not change it now?
